HSLLConnection.description: This is the schema definition for the HSLLConnection resource.
HSLLConnection.longDescription: This is the schema definition for the HSLLConnection resource. It represents the properties of a HSLLConnection.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ComposedNode.description: The ComposedNode this connection is part of
ComposedNode.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference that complies to the ComposedNode schema.

EndpointA.description: The first endpoint of this connection
EndpointA.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference that complies to the HSLLInterface schema.

EndpointB.description: The second endpoint of this connection.
EndpointB.longDescription: This object shall only contain a reference that complies to the HSLLInterface schema.

Links.description: The links object contains the links to other resources that are related to this resource.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

Width.description: Connection width of the HSLLConnection specified in number of lanes
Width.longDescription: The value of this property shall contain the connection width of the HSLLConnection specified in number of lanes.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.longDescription: This object represents the Oem property.  All values for resources described by this schema shall comply to the requirements as described in the Redfish specification.

title: #HSLLConnection.v1_0_0.HSLLConnection
